extendedInfo.description: FInd other people going in the same direction on the map (sport event, conference, air port). Chat with them anonymously, share the ride, safe money.- Great app for TAXI starved city like San Francisco.- Great "Don't drink and drive" initiative!- Great app to conserve energy and costs for people traveling the same direction.

reviews.title: Awesome Concept
reviews.comment: This is perfect for San Fran! Not nearly enough cabs to go around! Can\'t wait to share a ride to the airport and save some money too! Great idea!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for saving on ride costs
reviews.comment: Good app to find people going the same direction and saving on cab costs. I hope more people will show up on the map soon. Chat is very good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: it doesn\'t work on Galaxy Note
reviews.comment: it doesn\'t work on Galaxy Note
reviews.author: A Google User
